title: #91: Prosecuting Child Abusers with Francey Hakes
description:
The RCP team (Jim Clemene, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) welcome Francey Hakes, former state and federal prosecutor who specializes in crimes against children. She also is the co host of the podcast "Best Case Worst Case" along with our own Jim Clemente.

Francey discusses cases of child sexual abuse similar to the events depicted in The Keepers. Plus she explains the difficulties in prosecuting child abusers based upon biases and how adults view the testimony of children.

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime


Listen to Best Case Worst Case

http://wondery.com/wondery/shows/bestcaseworstcase/


Listen to Locked Up Abroad, the new Wondery podcast featuring Jim Clemente

http://wondery.com/wondery/shows/lockedupabroad/
